text: Any person who violates § 22-3401 shall be punished by a fine of not more than $300 or by imprisonment for not more than 90 days, or by both such fine and imprisonment.
historical:

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Use of "District of Columbia" by Certain Persons.

heading.catch_text: Use of "District of Columbia" or similar designation by private detective or collection agency--Penalty.
